name: Erase Master
description:
The funny and tricky puzzle game you’ve been seeing all this time is finally a reality!
Whether you are a fan of puzzlers, word games, trivia games, quiz games, brain teasers, or just want to have a good time, then Erase Master: Puzzle is the game for you! Just following the story and help the girl by erasing for the solution.

Stay in and play the most addicting and satisfying game. Use that big brain of yours and let’s get to solving!

Game Features:

1. Don’t be fooled!
Each level presents you funny situations - make the right erasing to proceed. Wrong answers will result in painful but funny outcomes to the girl!

2.Fantastic characters
Watch them live their lives and interact with each other in the in-game social network.

3. Amazing adventure by each level
Each level is unique. So many different challenges for you to solve.

4. Unique and Addicting Gameplay
Once you start you will want to keep solving the upcoming puzzles. This is the best puzzler out there!
